prompt: Photorealistic close-up of a skilled antique jewelry appraiser's hands meticulously examining an intricate Victorian-era gold locket using a traditional jeweler's loupe. The scene is set on a dark, polished wooden workbench. Soft, focused studio lighting highlights the fine details of the locket and the texture of the appraiser's experienced hands. Visible in the shallow depth of field background are other appraisal tools like precision scales and tweezers, arranged horizontally to complement the 16:9 aspect ratio. Style: Professional photography, macro detail, shallow DoF. --ar 16:9
name: antique-jewelry-appraisal-image-1.png

prompt: A wide-angle, slightly elevated shot capturing a professional antique jewelry appraiser's workspace. The central focus is an ornate Art Deco diamond and sapphire bracelet laid carefully on a white velvet cloth under a bright, angled desk lamp. The appraiser's hands, holding a gemological refractometer, are visible entering the frame from the side, poised to test a stone. The background shows a neat, organized desk with reference books and other antique pieces slightly out of focus, filling the landscape frame. Lighting: Bright, clean, focused task lighting. Style: Photorealistic, clinical precision, professional setting. --ar 16:9
name: antique-jewelry-appraisal-image-2.png

prompt: Elegant flat lay composition showcasing a diverse collection of antique jewelry pieces arranged for appraisal on a rich, dark burgundy velvet surface. Includes an Edwardian pearl necklace, a Georgian mourning ring, an Art Nouveau enamel brooch, and filigree silver earrings. Soft, diffused overhead lighting creates subtle highlights and shadows, emphasizing the textures and materials. The pieces are spread horizontally across the wide frame, inviting the viewer's eye to explore each item. Style: Museum quality photography, high detail, luxurious texture, balanced composition. --ar 16:9
name: antique-jewelry-appraisal-image-3.png

prompt: A detailed shot focusing on a completed antique jewelry appraisal certificate lying open on an antique mahogany desk. Next to the document rests the appraised item: a stunning antique emerald and diamond cluster ring. Soft, warm window light illuminates the scene from the side, highlighting the ring's facets and the official text/signature on the paper. The composition places the document slightly angled on the left two-thirds of the frame, with the ring prominently featured on the right third. Style: Photorealistic, documentary style, warm natural light, focus on authenticity. --ar 16:9
name: antique-jewelry-appraisal-image-4.png

prompt: Over-the-shoulder perspective focusing on an antique pocket watch with intricate engravings being presented by a well-dressed appraiser across a polished counter to an unseen client. Only the appraiser's hands (holding the watch) and the client's hands (reaching slightly) are clearly visible in the foreground. The background shows the softly blurred interior of a high-end appraisal office or jewelry store, with glass display cases hinting at other treasures, filling the wide 16:9 frame. Lighting: Warm, sophisticated ambient light. Style: Photorealistic, shallow depth of field, focus on the interaction and the object, professional atmosphere. --ar 16:9
name: antique-jewelry-appraisal-image-5.png
